SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Controller

Class LotteryDrawScheduler

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Controller.LotteryDrawScheduler
public class LotteryDrawScheduler extends Object
When an event is scheduled, this class schedules the alarm on the organizer's phone to call the draw at the event registration deadline for the next users

  • Method Details

    • scheduleNewLotteryDraw

      public void scheduleNewLotteryDraw(android.content.Context context, Event event)
      Schedules a new lottery draw alarm for an event that did not previously have a lottery draw alarm
      Parameters:
      context - A context object representing the current state of the system
      event - The event that we want to schedule the new alarm for

    • scheduleUpdateLotteryDraw

      public void scheduleUpdateLotteryDraw(android.content.Context context, Event event)
      Given some event with an already existing lottery draw, we replace that lottery draw alarm with an updated lottery draw alarm
      Parameters:
      context - A context object representing the current state of the system
      event - The event that we want to update the alarm for

    • scheduleRemoveLotteryDraw

      public void scheduleRemoveLotteryDraw(android.content.Context context, Event event)
      Given some event with an already existing lottery draw, we remove that lottery draw alarm
      Parameters:
      context - A context object representing the current state of the system
      event - The event that we want to update the alarm for

    • scheduleLotteryDraw

      @RequiresPermission("android.permission.SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM") public void scheduleLotteryDraw(android.content.Context context, Event event, boolean update, boolean remove)
      Schedules a lottery draw alarm to trigger at a later date and time
      Parameters:
      context - A context object representing the current state of the system
      event - The event that we are scheduling the alarm for
      update - A boolean that represents whether or not we are updating a current event scheduled alarm
      remove - A boolean that represents whether or not we are trying to remove a current event scheduled alarm

    • scheduleAlarm

      @RequiresPermission("android.permission.SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM") public void scheduleAlarm(android.content.Context context, String deviceToken, String title, String body, LocalDateTime scheduledTime)
      A dead method now that the functionality is moved into scheduleLotteryDraw, this method would schedule notifications
      Parameters:
      context - A context object representing the current state of the system
      deviceToken - The Firebase Messaging Service device token for sending notifications
      title - The notification title
      body - The notification body
      scheduledTime - The scheduled time to send the notification
